message: COMPREHENSIVE COURSE STRUCTURE MAPPING COMPLETE: Created master document consolidating all 11 weeks of PSYC100 content. Document includes: (1) Complete week-to-topic mapping with date ranges, (2) Assessment structure (2 midterms 30% each at weeks 7&12, final 40%), (3) Detailed learning outcomes for all 11 content weeks, (4) Consolidated findings from all 6 peer content analyst agents, (5) Analysis completeness checklist showing 100% coverage, (6) Recommendations for Phase 2 implementation. File saved to workspace: PHASE1_COURSE_STRUCTURE_COMPREHENSIVE_MAPPING.md (24KB). This master mapping serves as the authoritative reference for Phase 2 JSON content generation.
